LanguageData.ColonySync.Settings.Pages.Morality.Karma: Whether to enable the karma system
LanguageData.ColonySync.Settings.Pages.Morality.Descr: The karma system is a system that provides immediate consequences for viewers by limited their income. Viewers will have to then purchase more helpful events to repay the karmic debt they’ve grown.
The number of karma viewers will start off when they first interact with the mod, or their data is reset.
A range indicating the upper and lower bounds a viewer’s karma can be.
Whether the reputation system, a system for providing long-term consequences for harmful events viewers may purchase, is enabled.
